paper.title: Bounded SVM Strategy for Decision-Making in the Stock Market
paper.abstract: The main aim of this paper is focused on the possibility of using SVM regression model as a decision making tool. This model is used for financial markets prediction (generating buy and sell trading orders), especially for U.S. stocks and ETFs (AAPL, IBM, SPY, GLD, SLV, OIL, XIV). This portfolio of U.S. stocks and ETFs is used for scientific research and for testing in real market, too. The main assumptions were to predict Friday's closing prices on Monday (before market opens). We express the excitement about this statistical technique as it performed admirably even without optimising the input variable set or the regression parameters. We used the conventional RMSE as a measure of this uncertainty, but we also noted slight ambiguity of its interpretation.

domain_result.justification: 该论文的核心技术是使用SVM回归模型进行股票和ETF的交易决策（生成买卖订单），这直接涉及投资组合的构建和调整，属于投资组合管理的范畴。论文并未涉及衍生品定价或金融风险管理的具体应用。
